BESA.Extern

Class BAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Extern.BAP

  • public class BAP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the access point of the Extern model.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

      • SEND_EVENT_BAP

        public static final java.lang.String SEND_EVENT_BAP
        In the communication between BAPs, the sentence "SEND_EVENT" indicates to BAP receptor that the data are a DataBESA.
